content: this is **snowflake no 3 flower star** snowflake no 4 **sun star** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sun-star-snowflake snowflake no 2 **frosted lace** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/frosted-lace-snowflake snowflake no 1 **winter flower** https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/winter-flower-snowflake finished diameter 10 cm thread required 20 m this pattern is one of 4 **from the christmas snowflakes mobile 2019 ** create beautiful christmas wall hanging in cotton thread this pattern is included in a 5 -page pdf download that includes 2 pages of photos and a chart **materials ** yarn scheepjes sweet treat bonbon 25 g/140 m and drops glitter silver 700 meters 10g hook 1 75 mm or 2 mm depends from your gauge scissors tapestry needle to weave in ends finished size the size of the finished flower depends on the yarn and hook you use **skill level** upper beginner or intermediate this easy to make **textured snowflake** can be a great decoration for your christmas tree worked in 6 rounds from the center out note that you have to be **familiar with post stitches** it is optional but most snowflakes need to be blocked and lightely stiffened
